sentences.en: He was examined again and then prescribed a different herbal medicine.
sentences.cn: 医生又对他诊察了一遍，然后开了另外一种草药。

sentences.en: I'll try a herbal remedy to calm him down.
sentences.cn: 我来用草药试试，看能不能让他镇静下来。

sentences.en: I've tried everything from herbal cigarettes to chewing gum.
sentences.cn: 中草药香烟、口香糖之类的我统统都试过了。

sentences.en: It was found out that certain herbal medicines had curative effect on AIDS.
sentences.cn: 经研究发现有些草药对艾滋病有疗效.

sentences.en: Mum was a great believer in herbal medicines.
Our range of herbal teas contain no preservatives, colourings or artificial flavourings.
sentences.cn: 我们这一系列的药草茶不含防腐剂、色素以及人工调味品。

sentences.en: She loves to drink herbal teas.
The leaves, bark and sap are also common ingredients of local herbal remedies.
sentences.cn: 树叶、树皮和树汁也是当地草药的常用药材。

sentences.en: They do a good range of herbal tea.
sentences.cn: 他们经营种类繁多的花草茶。

sentences.en: This doctor often uses herbal remedies.
sentences.cn: 这个医生常用草药治病.

sentences.en: This herbal medicine will soon clear up your cold.
sentences.cn: 这种草药能很快治好你的感冒.

sentences.en: This herbal ointment will help to close up your wound quickly.
sentences.cn: 这种中草药膏会帮助你的伤口很快愈合.

sentences.en: Three of the new products are based on traditional herbal medicines.
sentences.cn: 有3种新产品是以传统的草药为基础研制的。

sentences.en: To some people, herbal medicine is quackery.
sentences.cn: 在有些人看来，用草药治病纯属江湖医术。

sentences.en: We produce our own hair-care products, all based on herbal recipes.
sentences.cn: 我们自己生产护发产品,全部采用草本配方.
